seasons.title: The Inexplicable Universe with Neil deGrasse Tyson

episodes.synopsis: Take a look at concepts that were once unexplainable but, thanks to modern physics, are now better understood, such as the existence of "aether."
episodes.title: History's Mysteries

episodes.synopsis: Did you know electrons have never actually been observed by scientists? Delve into this and other mind-warping facts about the fundamentals of matter.
episodes.title: The Spooky Universe

episodes.synopsis: Explore the potential origins of life in the universe, as well as the notion that life may have come to Earth from another planet.
episodes.title: Inexplicable Life

episodes.synopsis: Learn about the discovery of more elements on the periodic table and the hope that string theory may unify all the particles and forces of physics.
episodes.title: Inexplicable Physics

episodes.synopsis: Examine facets of space that science uncovered in the past 50 years, including two long-standing puzzles in astrophysics: dark matter and dark energy.
episodes.title: Inexplicable Space

episodes.synopsis: Take a fascinating trip through dimensions higher than ours. Also, join Dr. Tyson for a preview of the universe's long-term fate.
episodes.title: Inexplicable Cosmology

video.title: The Inexplicable Universe with Neil deGrasse Tyson
video.synopsis: Host Tyson reveals how cutting-edge technology enables modern scientists to explore the wonders of the universe as never before.
